What Robots Can Do and Their Future

Michael Tian. 03/31/2021

Robotics is an important field of study that involves computer science and engineering. It also involves construction, design, and robots. Robots are a type of machine that is used to help humans. They take a long time to make perfectly without any problems because they are very complicated, but they are important because they allow people to complete tasks more efficiently.

Robotics has helped people a lot. As of right now, robots can do more basic things like cleaning floors, cooking, and flying around with a camera to take pictures (such as drones). But once people study more about robotics and how they function, they can become more advanced. These days, people are even trying to build robots that can do jobs, such as firefighters, so that not as many firefighters will get injured. Those types of robots are hard to make; however, in the future, there will eventually be robots that can do those jobs. They may also help serve food in restaurants. Amazon is already planning to use robots to deliver packages. This is very important because it can help save time by doing things so they can focus on other more important jobs. As robots will also get more advanced, they can help people save a lot of time.

Robots are very important, as they are getting more and more advanced. They can do a lot of things to help people and save time, and they will play a more significant role in peopleâ€™s lives in the future.

Sources
"10 Incredible Things Robots Can Do." Learning Resources, 9 Apr. 2018, blog.learningresources .com/robots-do-what/. Accessed 21 Mar. 2021.
